coreAttributes.name: Elis Town Hall Pass
coreAttributes.description: A plastic card which grants the holder access to the tower of Elis's town hall.

effectTooltipLines.line: [style.colourGood(Grants access)] to Elis's town hall's tower

coreAttributes.applyEffects: Signed by Minotally's personal assistant, Arion, this pass carries a 'gold' level clearance, which, due to the fact that it grants you unrestricted access to Minotallys herself, you assume to be the highest level of clearance there is.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] a closer look at the pass...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(show)] off [npc.her] pass to [npc2.name], who is duly impressed by [npc.her] possession of it...
